sentences.cn: 澳大利亚队2比1战胜了荷兰队。
澳大利亚队2比1战胜了荷兰队。

sentences.en: Having identified the problem, the question arises of how to overcome it.
sentences.cn: 发现问题后，如何克服它的问题又出现了。

sentences.en: He made determined efforts to overcome the scandal.
sentences.cn: 他作出了坚持不懈的努力去克服丑闻造成的不良影响。

sentences.en: He struggled to overcome his shyness.
sentences.cn: 他努力克服自己的羞怯。

sentences.en: He was then overcome by a terrible fit of coughing.
sentences.cn: 接着他便控制不住地剧烈咳嗽了一阵。

sentences.en: Her financial problems could no longer be overcome.
sentences.cn: 她的经济困难再也无法解决。

sentences.en: I then realized how possible it was to overcome your limitations.
sentences.cn: 那时我才意识到，人克服自身局限的可能性到底有多大。

sentences.en: I was overcome with bashfulness when I met her.
sentences.cn: 遇到她时我显得极其羞怯。

sentences.en: I would overcome any weakness, any despair, any fear.
sentences.cn: 我要克服所有的软弱、绝望和恐惧。

sentences.en: Molly had fought and overcome her fear of flying.
sentences.cn: 莫莉已经努力克服了对飞行的恐惧。

sentences.en: Other subjects covered included nerves and how to overcome them.
sentences.cn: 所涉及的其他主题包括焦虑及如何克服。

sentences.en: She was trying to overcome her physical repugnance for him.
sentences.cn: 她努力克制对他非常强烈的反感。

sentences.en: She will need medical help and counselling to overcome the tragedy.
sentences.cn: 她需要借助医学治疗和心理咨询来克服惨剧带来的影响。

sentences.en: Some hearing-impaired children may work harder to overcome their handicap.
sentences.cn: 一些有听障的儿童可能需要花更大的力气来克服这一缺陷。

sentences.en: Something gave me the strength to overcome the difficulty.
sentences.cn: 有些事给了我克服困难的勇气。

sentences.en: These difficulties have been overcome without detriment to performance.
sentences.cn: 这些困难都已在不影响业绩的情况下得到了克服。

sentences.en: To succeed, you must learn to overcome obstacles.
sentences.cn: 必须学会克服困难才能成功。

sentences.en: With repeated applications of weedkiller, the weeds were overcome.
sentences.cn: 经过反复施用除草剂，杂草得以彻底根除。

trans.tran_cn: 克服，战胜，受到…的极大影响，被熏倒
trans.tran_en: to successfully control a feeling or problem that prevents you from achieving something
to successfully control a feeling or problem that prevents you from achieving something
